trans-unit.source: Docs script will now clean up the built doc directory before execution, if it exists (e.g., because the docs job is being rerun). (#96)

trans-unit.source: Downstream repos will now be automatically updated when nengo-bones is updated. (#97)
trans-unit.target: 现在，在更新nengo-bones时，下游存储库将自动更新。（＃97）

trans-unit.source: Fixed a crash when a file contained the text “Automatically generated by nengo-bones”, but was not present in the config file. (#61, #66)
trans-unit.target: 修复了当文件包含文本“由nengo-bones自动生成”但在配置文件中不存在时的崩溃。（＃61，＃66）

trans-unit.source: Fixed deployment tag conditional check in
trans-unit.target: 修正了部署标签的条件检查

trans-unit.source: Initial release of Nengo Bones! Thanks to all of the contributors for making this possible!

trans-unit.target: 现在，所有python版本的模板化字典的顺序都应该是确定的。（＃14）

trans-unit.source: Removed coverage.py early starting logic. This is no longer necessary as of Nengo 3.0 and causes problems with the new coverage.py 5.0 release. (#78)
trans-unit.target: 删除了coverage.py的早期启动逻辑。从Nengo 3.0开始，这不再是必需的，并且会导致新的coverage.py 5.0版本出现问题。（＃78）

trans-unit.source: Rendered documentation will not be uploaded if the html build fails (it will still be uploaded if the linkchecker/doctest builds fail). (#98)
trans-unit.target: 如果html构建失败，则不会上载呈现的文档（如果linkchecker / doctest构建失败，则仍将上载）。（＃98）

trans-unit.source: Rendered documentation will not be uploaded on cron builds. (#98)
trans-unit.target: 渲染的文档将不会在cron版本上上传。（＃98）

trans-unit.source: Take advantage of multiprocessing to speed up pylint static checks. (#49)
trans-unit.target: 利用多处理来加快pylint静态检查。（＃49）

trans-unit.source: Templates will now be autoformatted with Black during the rendering process, if Black is installed. (#49)
trans-unit.target: 现在，如果已安装Black，则模板将在渲染过程中使用Black自动格式化。（＃49）

trans-unit.source: Templates will now be automatically loaded from a
The Python version is now specified by the

The aim of this project is to automate the configuration of repositories throughout the Nengo ecosystem. The idea is that we can centralize the design and maintenance of “meta” project code (such as CI testing infrastructure) in this project, rather than each repository maintaining that code independently.
trans-unit.target: 该项目的目的是使整个Nengo生态系统中的存储库配置自动化。我们的想法是，我们可以在此项目中集中设计和维护“元”项目代码（例如CI测试基础结构），而不是每个存储库都单独维护该代码。

trans-unit.source: The basic methodology for this project is a templating system in which there are common templates for meta files that are populated with data in each downstream project. Projects control this templating through the
trans-unit.target: 这个项目的基本方法是一个模板系统,在这个系统中,有通用的元文件模板,在每个下游项目中,这些模板都会被填充数据。项目通过以下方式控制这种模板化
